alert.note: Alert for Butte, Blackfoot Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 22 at 12:26PM MST until November 24 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of half an inch to 2 inches for the valleys. 2 to 4 inches for MacDonald Pass and Homestake Pass. Winds gusting up to 35 mph may cause blowing snow over the mountain passes. * WHERE...Butte/Blackfoot Region, including the Interstate 90 corridor from Drummond to Butte, Homestake Pass and MacDonald Pass * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. Melting snow may refreeze on roadways, creating slick conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
